summary.para: Encodes the image to the frame given by the IWICBitmapFrameEncode.

param.name: pImage
param.para: The Direct2D image that will be encoded.

param.name: pFrameEncode
param.para: The frame encoder to which the image is written.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: The image passed in must be created on the same device as in . If the pImageParameters are not specified, a set of useful defaults will be assumed, see for more info.
You must correctly and independently have set up the IWICBitmapFrameEncode before calling this API.

summary.para: Encodes the image as a thumbnail to the frame given by the IWICBitmapFrameEncode.

param.name: pImage
param.para: The Direct2D image that will be encoded.

param.name: pFrameEncode
param.para: The frame encoder on which the thumbnail is set.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: The image passed in must be created on the same device as in . If the pImageParameters are not specified, a set of useful defaults will be assumed, see for more info.
You must correctly and independently have set up the IWICBitmapFrameEncode before calling this API.

summary.para: Encodes the given image as the thumbnail to the given WIC bitmap encoder.

param.name: pImage
param.para: The Direct2D image that will be encoded.

param.name: pEncoder
param.para: The encoder on which the thumbnail is set.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: You must create the image that you pass in on the same device as in . If you don't specify additional parameters in the variable that pImageParameters points to, the encoder uses a set of useful defaults. For info about these defaults, see .
Before you call WriteThumbnail, you must set up the interface for the encoder on which you want to set the thumbnail.
If WriteThumbnail fails, it might return E_OUTOFMEMORY, D2DERR_WRONG_RESOURCE_DOMAIN, or other error codes from the encoder.

summary.para: Encodes interfaces to an IWICBitmapEncoder. The input images can be larger than the maximum device texture size.
